name: Set Source Control Username
description: Map the Source Control usernames with FortiSOAR user

schema.title: Map User and Add as a Collaborator
schema.description:
Map the source control username to the FortiSOAR user

Select a repository to add the mapped user as a collaborator with ***"Write"*** permissions

inputVariables.name: fortiSOARUsername
inputVariables.label: FortiSOAR Username
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)
inputVariables.tooltip: Select the FotiSOAR user which you want to map with Source Control username

inputVariables.name: sourceControlUsername
inputVariables.label: Source Control Username
inputVariables.tooltip: Enter the Source Control username which you want to map with FortiSOAR user

inputVariables.name: prod_content_role
inputVariables.label: Production Content Repository
inputVariables.title: Checkbox
inputVariables.tooltip: Add as a Collaborator with a "Write" role to the "Prod Content Repository"

inputVariables.name: dev_settings_role
inputVariables.label: Development Settings Repository
inputVariables.title: Checkbox
inputVariables.tooltip: Add as a Collaborator with a "Write" role to the "Dev Settings Repository"

step_variables.collaborator_repo: {% set repo_names = [] %}{% if vars.steps.Add_Development_Collaborator.input['prod_content_role'] %}{% set _= repo_names.append(vars.cicd_config.contentRepoName) %}{% endif %}{% if vars.steps.Add_Development_Collaborator.input['dev_settings_role'] %}{% set _= repo_names.append(vars.cicd_config.devSettingsRepoName) %}{% endif %}{{repo_names}}

arguments.internal_email_subject: A FortiSOAR playbook is requesting your input

schema.title: Map User and Add as a Collaborator
schema.description:
Map the source control username to the FortiSOAR user

Select a repository to add the mapped user as a collaborator with ***"Write"*** permissions.

inputVariables.name: fortiSOARUsername
inputVariables.label: FortiSOAR Username
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)
inputVariables.tooltip: Select the FotiSOAR user which you want to map with Source Control username

inputVariables.name: sourceControlUsername
inputVariables.label: Source Control Username
inputVariables.tooltip: Enter the Source Control username which you want to map with FortiSOAR user

inputVariables.name: prod_content_role
inputVariables.label: Production Content Repository
inputVariables.title: Checkbox
inputVariables.tooltip: Add as a Collaborator with a "Write" role to the "Prod Content Repository" aads

inputVariables.name: prod_settings_role
inputVariables.label: Production Settings Repository
inputVariables.title: Checkbox
inputVariables.tooltip: Add as a Collaborator with a "Write" role to the "Prod Settings Repository"

inputVariables.name: dev_settings_role
inputVariables.label: Development Settings Repository
inputVariables.title: Checkbox
inputVariables.tooltip: Add as a Collaborator with a "Write" role to the "Dev Settings Repository"

step_variables.collaborator_repo: {% set repo_names = [] %}{% if vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['prod_content_role'] %}{% set _= repo_names.append(vars.cicd_config.contentRepoName) %}{% endif %}{% if vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['prod_settings_role'] %}{% set _= repo_names.append(vars.cicd_config.prodSettingsRepoName) %}{% endif %}{% if vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['dev_settings_role'] %}{% set _= repo_names.append(vars.cicd_config.devSettingsRepoName) %}{% endif %}{{repo_names}}

arguments.internal_email_subject: A FortiSOAR playbook is requesting your input

schema.title: Repositories are not present
schema.description: Create the repositories before mapping the Source Control Username {{vars.source_control_username}} to FortiSOAR Username

arguments.internal_email_subject: A FortiSOAR playbook is requesting your input

message.content: Initiating Task: Map Source Control Username to FortiSOAR user

Mapped Following FortiSOAR User

  • FortiSOAR User: {{vars.fsr_username}}
  • Source Control User: {{vars.source_control_username}}

resource.results:
{{vars.steps.Find_Previous_Result[0].results}}

Mapped Following FortiSOAR User

  • FortiSOAR User: {{vars.fsr_username}}
  • Source Control User: {{vars.source_control_username}}

message.content:
{% if vars.steps.Add_Development_Collaborator.input['prod_content_role'] or vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['prod_content_role'] %}

Assigned write permission on "Production Content Repository" to {{vars.fsr_username}} FortiSOAR user.

{% endif %}

{% if vars.steps.Add_Development_Collaborator.input['prod_settings_role'] or vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['prod_settings_role'] %}

Assigned write permission on "Production Settings Repository" to {{vars.fsr_username}} FortiSOAR user.

{% endif %}

{% if vars.steps.Add_Development_Collaborator.input['dev_settings_role'] or vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['dev_settings_role'] %}

Assigned write permission on "Development Settings Repository" to {{vars.fsr_username}} FortiSOAR user.

{% endif %}

resource.results:
{{vars.steps.Find_Previous_Updated_Result[0].results}}

{% if vars.steps.Add_Development_Collaborator.input['prod_content_role'] or vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['prod_content_role'] %}

Assigned write permission on "Production Content Repository" to {{vars.fsr_username}} FortiSOAR user.

{% endif %}

{% if vars.steps.Add_Development_Collaborator.input['prod_settings_role'] or vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['prod_settings_role'] %}

Assigned write permission on "Production Settings Repository" to {{vars.fsr_username}} FortiSOAR user.

{% endif %}

{% if vars.steps.Add_Development_Collaborator.input['dev_settings_role'] or vars.steps.Add_Production_Collaborator.input['dev_settings_role'] %}

Assigned write permission on "Development Settings Repository" to {{vars.fsr_username}} FortiSOAR user.

{% endif %}

message.content: Completed Task: Map Source Control Username to FortiSOAR user

routes.name: Add Source Control Repository Collaborator -> Find Previous Updated Result
Check Record Type -> Add Development Collaborator
routes.label: Development

routes.name: Check Record Type -> Copy of Add Development Collaborator
routes.label: Production

routes.name: Check Source Control Connector Configuration -> Add Source Control Repository Collaborator
Copy of Find Previous Result -> Copy of Update Record
Copy of Update Record -> Update Status as Pending
Get Source Control Details -> Check Record Type
Is Repositories Present -> Repositories Not Present
routes.label: No

routes.name: Is Repositories Present -> Update Source Control Username
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Repositories Not Present -> Update Status as Pending
routes.label: Ok

routes.name: Set Status to In Progress -> Get Source Control Details
Start -> Set Status to In Progress
Update Record -> Check Source Control Connector Configuration
Update Source Control Username -> Find Previous Result
